column1: '''Dimas Caparrós Gómez''' is a Spanish game designer and founder of the (now defunct) Dimassoft. He wrote and designed ''[[El Señor de los Anillos
column2: Parte I: La Communidad del Anillo (Libro 1)]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/anillos.html El Señor de los Anillos
